sentences.english: On his way to the harvest supper Gabriel stopped to check the eight huge hay-and wheat-ricks.
sentences.chinese: 蓋伯瑞爾走在路上，停下來查看那八個麥垛。

sentences.english: This novel is about the life of the Morels.
sentences.chinese: 小說主要講述莫瑞爾一家兩代人的生活。

sentences.english: Gabriel giggled and waved bye-bye back to him.
sentences.chinese: 蓋布瑞爾喫喫的笑著並回以揮手再見的手勢。

sentences.english: Berel had remained true to the old orthodoxy.
sentences.chinese: 斑瑞爾一直忠實格守古老的正統觀念。

sentences.english: On his way back to Coggan's house, Gabriel met Boldwood.
sentences.chinese: 蓋伯瑞爾在回考根家的路上，遇到了伯德伍德。

sentences.english: He noticed a light further down the hill.
sentences.chinese: 蓋伯瑞爾注意到在山下有燈光。

sentences.english: Louis Riel, the leader of the Métis was hanged for treason in 1885 for his leading role in resisting the federal government.
sentences.chinese: 瑞爾，因帶頭試圖反抗聯邦政府以叛國的罪名被絞死。

sentences.english: Grande Prairie Regional College is a public supported post-secondary institution.
sentences.chinese: 格蘭伯瑞爾地區學院是一所公立大專以上教育院校。

sentences.english: Renee Terrell says her boyfriend Christopher Luttrell is the killer.
sentences.chinese: 特雷爾說她的男友克里斯托弗“魯特瑞爾纔是兇手。

sentences.english: Gabriel looked hopelessly away and did not reply.
sentences.chinese: 蓋伯瑞爾失望地把目光移開，默不作聲。

sentences.english: 'Is this the right way to Weatherbury?' asked Gabriel .
sentences.chinese: “這是去威瑟伯裏的路嗎？”蓋伯瑞爾問。

sentences.english: One way of using the movement of waves as source of energy is to build a Cockerell raft.
sentences.chinese: 利用海浪能的方法之一是建造一個考克爾瑞爾筏。

sentences.english: Poor Darrell was in danger of overheating as the green flag dropped.
sentences.chinese: 可憐的戴瑞爾在綠旗揮下前就情緒過分激動。

sentences.english: Louis Riel, the leader of the Metis was hanged for treason in 1885 for his leading role in resisting the federal government.
sentences.chinese: 瑞爾，因帶頭試圖反抗聯邦政府以叛國的罪名被絞死。

sentences.english: He showed Gabriel the envelope containing the valentine.
sentences.chinese: 他讓蓋伯瑞爾看那個裝着情人卡的信封。

sentences.english: So Darryl, how do you keep up the strength?
sentences.chinese: 達瑞爾，你是如何保持實力的？
